title: Radim Peško informations
content:
Hello,

I'm actually working on a school project about Radim Peško and I would like to know a bit more from him. If anybody have some informations (or intuitions) about him and his fonts it would be great!  
I've just ordered his specimen, maybe it will tell me more…  
 [http://www.radimpesko.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20150110152239/http:/www.radimpesko.com/ "http://www.radimpesko.com")

Thank you!
author: Shloh

comments.content: Thank you for your link, I've also found a good article about the Larish Alte, if someone is interested [http://fontsinuse.com/uses/7286/from-larisch-s-plinius-to-larish-alte-an...](http://web.archive.org/web/20150110152239/http:/fontsinuse.com/uses/7286/from-larisch-s-plinius-to-larish-alte-and-lar "http://fontsinuse.com/uses/7286/from-larisch-s-plinius-to-larish-alte-and-lar")
